item.title: @elonmusk: NEWS: Alaska Airlines has announced that it is accelerating the rollout of@Starlinkin-flight Wi-Fi a...
item.description: NEWS: Alaska Airlines has announced that it is accelerating the rollout of@Starlinkin-flight Wi-Fi across its entire fleet after extremely successful performance on regional aircraft. "The decision reflects growing confidence in Starlinkâ€™s ability to deliver fast, reliable connectivity for passengers. After these promising results, Alaska has decided to fast-track its original 2026-2027 plan for fleetwide Starlink installation."

item.title: @elonmusk: I just tried Tesla FSD for the first time and WOW it completely blew me away. Cybertruck drove me fu...
item.description: I just tried Tesla FSD for the first time and WOW it completely blew me away. Cybertruck drove me fully autonomously from south austin to dallas (>200 miles!), without me having to touch the steering wheel, gas, or brakes even once. Iâ€™ve never been more impressed by a new technology. It handled city and highway, construction zones, on/off ramps, stop lights, red lights, and lane changes at human or better levels. Every legacy auto maker is dead in the water. You simply cannot compete with this.
